name: Adidas First Responder Discount
description: 30% off full-price, 20% off outlet for first responders
fullDescription: Adidas offers a 30% discount to first responders on full-price items and 20% off at outlet stores. Verification through ID.me required.
whatTheyOffer:
- 30% off full-price items on adidas.com
- 20% off at Adidas outlet stores
- Applies to shoes, clothing, and accessories
- Can be combined with some promotions
- Available to verified first responders
howToGetIt:
1. Visit adidas.com
2. Sign in and verify status through ID.me
3. Eligible: firefighters, EMTs, police, paramedics
4. Discount applied at checkout automatically
5. Valid on adidas.com and outlet stores
keywords: Adidas, first responder discount, firefighter, police, EMT, 30% off, athletic wear, shoes, ID.me
